text: The Aklavik First Nation is a Gwich'in First Nations band government in the Northwest Territories. The band is located in Aklavik, a mixed community of First Nations, Inuit, and non-Indigenous people. The Aklavik First Nation is a member of the Gwich'in Tribal Council. ==References== Category:First Nations in the Northwest Territories Category:Gwich'in
title: Aklavik First Nation
